resources.string: For some characters you have to type a key two or three times. Other characters needs a combination of the \'yellow\' keys: MELUPM, PASEKH, KOMETS, RAFE, DOT\n \n The \'red\' keys are a bit special: e.g. for a יִ you have to type the ייִ key, wait a bit and then tap this key 2 times again to get the dot. For a ײַ you have to type the ייִ key 3 times and then the PASEKH key.
